name: Wooden Ninjas
description:
Wooden Ninjas is a local multiplayer party game for 2 to 4 players.  Get with your friends and shoot, slice, and dodge your way to victory.

Controls

A - Dodge

B - Parry

X - Slash

Y - Stun

LB - Lock on

RB - Switch targets

Left Trigger - Block

Right Trigger - Shoot

The game was made for the My First Game Jam summer 2017.  The main inspiration for the game was to make a multiplayer version of the game Furi.
